setting.time: Early 1600s Spain, late summer, dawn breaking
setting.location: Vast plains of La Mancha region, central Spain, windmills dotting horizon
setting.weather: Clear morning sky with golden sunrise, light morning mist

scene.mainElements: Wide panoramic view of La Mancha countryside at dawn, showing flat plains stretching to horizon, several traditional Spanish windmills silhouetted against rising sun, small village with church tower visible in distance, cultivated fields divided by low stone walls, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Traditional white cylindrical windmills with conical roofs and large wooden blades catching first light, morning mist hovering over wheat fields, flock of sheep grazing in distant pasture, winding dirt road cutting through landscape, olive groves scattered across hillsides, Spanish architectural elements visible in distant village buildings, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Mountain range barely visible on far horizon, birds beginning morning flight patterns, smoke rising from chimneys in village
scene.atmosphere: Peaceful Spanish countryside awakening to new day, golden hour lighting creating long shadows, sense of timeless rural tranquility mixed with anticipation of adventure ahead, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: High wide establishing shot from hilltop vantage point
composition.focus: Windmills as central elements with village and plains spreading outward
composition.depth: Foreground shows rocky terrain and wild herbs, middle ground features plains and windmills, background fades to distant mountains
